entry.title: How do I setup my Blog?
entry.content:
Background

I set up a blog recently. In this post, I'll show you how I went about setting it up.

Why

Turns out portfolio management is a huge thing now. Anyone you send your resume to, first thing they're going to be impressed with is how well you're able to present yourself. Having a blog as a showcase of what you do besides work can add some value to your skillset.
